name: MutualMind
tag_list: social-media, marketing, public-relations, social-media-marketing, response-management, monitoring, insights, business-intelligence
overview:
MutualMind is an enterprise social media management system. We offer powerful listening, social intelligence that drives business actions and integrated engagement to take your social media campaigns to the next level.

MutualMind, Inc. is a privately held company based in Dallas, Texas. The company believes in creating products which change the way business is done.

The company was founded in 2008 by a small team of passionate business and technology experts who have made a difference in the way social interactions impact business activities.
